channel.title: Operationalizing on-premise SaaS model
channel.description:
As our data integration SaaS grows, we are getting more and more business from the companies that are installing our software on-premise. Which makes sense since corporate databases are typically sitting behind the firewall.
In order to keep everything under control we have added the following elements to the infrastructure:
1. Online license manager (hosted on AWS). 2. Service, which calls home few times a day and reports key usage metrics. 3. Option to pay by check or wire transfer.
Is there anything missing from this list?
